alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Walton County through 215 PM CDT... At 152 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of De Funiak Springs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Bruce, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Ridge, New Home, Rock Hill and De Funiak Spring Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
